latestbrd-link: elite784:  manually rewinding a tape because i have nothing better to do
welcome1: You are entering 784studios.net. The content within this website is intended for a WEB-14 audience.
welcome3: We require you to use a computer and recommend the Firefox browser and a screen of at least 720p or above to view this page.
homedesc:
784 Studios is a one man media production company that creates and publishes ameture video productions on the internet.

Alongside this, we also offer services to people such as making your video look like it was actually recorded with VHS by using real VHS equipment, writing YouTube captions for those who want to reach a wider audience, and digitization of videotapes for those who want to preserve their memories shot on VHS at a more resonable cost than most of our competitors*.
Please check out our services section for more information about our services!

784 Studios also administers websites such as ELITE784[dot]Online, the personal website of a person, protogen, and webmaster on the internet! (i run this site! hai-nee!)


* Digitization service only available in Puerto Rico at this current time. Price claim based on independent research.

404desc1: We apoligize for this service disruption.
404desc2:
The page or file you're looking for doesn't seem to exist within 784studios.net.
Please try the following:
404desc-li:
• Check if the file name and directories is written correctly
  • Check if what you're looking for has been moved, renamed, or deleted.
  • Check the Wayback Machine on the Internet Archive.
404desc3: If nothing else works, contact the webmaster if you have reason to believe this is a mistake.

comment2a: below is 'Welcome to [784 Studios] .net The central website for everything by and asociated with 784 Studios'
elite784net: The personal channel of elite784 where he posts anything he pleases.
servicemaindesc: We need money, we offer services.
servicepayinfo:
Send an email about your order to elite784@outlook.com. We accept PayPal for international orders, and ATH Movil for PR local orders.
PAYMENT MUST BE SENT FIRST BEFORE WE BEGIN, EMAIL US FOR A FREE QUOTE!
dta-desc: Want the real analog look? We'll take your clean digital audio or video file, record it to a magnetic tape/send it over the air, and digitize it again for a truly dirty, imperfect analog feel!
dta-pricing-audio: For audio - Put your audio recordings into a tape
dta-pricing-audio1:
Type I;Normal tape - Normal, low fidelity tape, could sound muffled at times depending on cassette used.
99 cents a minute
dta-pricing-audio2:
Type II;CrO2 Tape - Better than Type I tape, sound is more high fidelity.
$1.10 a minute
dta-pricing-audio3: Type IV;Metal tape (We currently do not carry this tape) - Exellent sound! The most Hi-Fi you'll get out of an audio cassette!
dta-pricing-video: For video - Put your videos into a tape or send them off though the air and back
dta-pricing-video1:
SLP Tape - The lowest video quality from a video cassette, you'll definitively want to be using Hi-Fi audio with this speed unless the idea is to also have bad sound.
$5.00 for a video of 10 minutes or less, $4.30 every 4-8 minutes afterwards
dta-pricing-video2:
SP Tape - The best sound and video you can get on one of these video cassettes
$8.50 for a video of 8 minutes or less, $5.40 every 31/2-61/2 afterwards
dta-pricing-video3:
Live Television Broadcast - Send your video over the analog airwaves
$6.00 for a video of 10 minutes or less, $4 every 10 minutes afterwards
dta-pricing-video4:
Recorded Television Broadcast - Can't miss your favorite broadcast! Record the airwaves to watch it later!
$11.00 for a video of 8 minutes or less, $7 every 8 minutes afterwards.
dta-video-notice: You can ask for dissortions through email. Be aware that you will be charged extra for dissortions, since dissorting analog video requires some machine abuse. This extra charge allows us to maintain and repair our equipment.
ytcc-desc: Don't want to deal with the hassle of adding {CC} to your video? We'll do the work for you!
ytcc-notice: ** Notice: We will add [CLOSED CAPTIONS BY THE 784 STUDIOS CAPTIONING SERVICE] at a point in your video where we see fit. This allows other people to easily find the service. **
ytcc-price1: Normal captions: 20 cents per line
ytcc-price2: Fancy captions: 30 cents per line
ytcc-price3: Karaoke captioning: 40 cents or more per line depending on timing work
vhsarch-desc: Got precious tapes that need archiving? We got you covered, just send your tapes to us and we'll digitize your tapes for you!
vhsarch-price: $10/VHS and $8/VHS-C (Contact us via email for a free quote)
vhsarch-limits:
This service is currently a Puerto Rico local service only!!

** WE CAN ONLY CONVERT THE FOLLOWING TAPE FORMATS: VHS, VHS-C **
** WE CANNOT CONVERT THE FOLLOWING TAPE FORMATS: S-VHS, S-VHS-C, BETAMAX,
VIDEO8, HI8, DIGITAL8, and MINIDV AS WE DO NOT HAVE THE REQUIRED EQUIPMENT TO PLAY THESE **
